query: Operational handbook describing how SRI is rolled out in a neutral environment.

targets.text: This example corpus models an operational handbook describing how the SRI pipeline is deployed inside a neutral environment.

query: Analysts rely on provenance metadata to audit assembled responses.

targets.text: The Span Receipts Index pairs each span of text with provenance metadata so analysts can audit how a response was assembled.

query: Support engineers watch the /seen endpoint for latency regressions and linked receipts.

targets.text: The support rotation monitors the /seen route for latency regressions and verifies that /sbi answers include linkable receipts.
